short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables users to anonymously rate personal care products across a range of characteristics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover personal care products on Amazon that are liked by people with your traits! Anonymously rate your favorite products like shampoos, soaps, makeup, and more in a simple way. 

With Deena, you can find:
 - products that are popular among others in your age group, ethnicity, and gender. 
 - products that are popular among others with conditions like acne, sensitivity, and more.

Deena makes shopping for personal care products easier. No more buying care products that don't work!

Deena values privacy so all data is anonymous. Users may opt in to share data such as demographics when they rate a product. 


IP blocklisting may be used to prevent malicious users from using our services.  

Disclaimer link: https://www.freeprivacypolicy.com/live/4df4fb0f-9e36-4697-be7c-9db014e46ea7
